snippet.title: ORX - Exclusive Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Check out the new gameplay trailer and release window for the upcoming indie strategy game ORX.

ORX is a roguelike deckbuilding RTS featuring multiple factions to choose from, beautiful pencil-like art, and a truly unique set of game mechanics. Self-described in the trailer as "like playing Carcassonne with your table on fire," ORX features over 300 unique cards, 4 playable factions, and buildable fortresses to help repel your enemies, and mixes deck mechanics of games like Slay and the Spire with RTS games like Command and Conquer.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNSummerOfGaming
